articles.title: After half a decade, the Russian space station segment stopped leaking - Ars Technica
articles.description: NASA and Roscosmos continue to monitor and investigate the previously observed cracks."

articles.author: Sean Conlon, Fred Imbert
articles.title: Stock futures rise to kick off 2026 as tech shares pick up where they left off 2025: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Stock futures rose Friday, the first trading day of 2026, as tech looked to build on its momentum from last year.
articles.content:
Stock futures rose Friday, the first trading day of 2026, as tech looked to build on its momentum from last year. 
Dow Jones Industrial Average futures traded 192 points higher, or 0.4%. S&P 500… [+1570 chars]
